Class KitChannelDetailsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magnet.max.android.helpers.abs.MaxCoreBaseHelper

  • public final class KitChannelDetailsHelper
extends com.magnet.max.android.helpers.abs.MaxCoreBaseHelper
